name: AIDA-CoNLL (test)
description: Test set (test B) of the AIDA-CoNLL dataset. 231 news articles from the 1990s. The benchmark is based on the CoNLL-2003 dataset for NER tagging. Hoffart et al. manually annotated the existing proper-noun mentions with corresponding entities in the YAGO2 knowledge base. The dataset has a strong tendency towards sports articles. This results in a large amount of demonym and metonym entity mentions.
